{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=LAPAC1750 |revision=PRO |series=AC1750 |asin=B00KB49QUK |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=CyberTAN |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |fcc_date=05/06/2014 |fcc_id=Q87-LAPAC1750PO |ic_id=3839A-LAPAC1750PO |type=access point |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=at |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM53016A1 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30LF1G08AA-TI |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646E-BCK0 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43431 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43460 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=LACP, Link Aggregation, |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=B4:75:0E |oui_eth=B4:75:0E }} {{TagLine|AC1750 Pro Dual-Band Access Point}} :[https://www.linksys.com/us/support-product?pid=01t80000003da5rAAA Support page] {{â€¢}} [http://downloads.linksys.com/downloads/datasheet/1224702028350/Linksys_Wireless_Pro_Dual_Band_Access_Point_PoE_DS_NAPV_027462_1.pdf Data Sheet]
*Ethernet Port: 2x 1GbE (1x PoE+ 802.3at) *Antenna: 3x internal antenna :Gain: 4.4dBi (2.4GHz)/5.2dBi (5GHz)
*{{WiFiCert|WFA54385|04/25/2014}} :The WFA cert. indicates this device is ''Broadcom'' based :([[Broadcom]] BCM43431/BCM43460)
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32527-linksys-lapac1750pro-ac1750-pro-dual-band-access-point-reviewed ''Linksys LAPAC1750PRO'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Processors/Enterprise/BCM5301x-Series BCM53016] @1GHz (ARM Cortex-A9) :Flash: ''Macronix'' MX30LF1G08AA (128MB) :RAM: ''Samsung'' K4B2G1646E (256MB DDR3) :2.4GHz Radio: [[Broadcom]] [http://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s742779 BCM43431] :2.4G PA: 3x ''Microsemi'' MSC5518 :5GHz Radio: [[Broadcom]] [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM43460 BCM43460] :5GHz PA: 3x [[Skyworks]] SE5003L1 (23dBm) *[http://www.mbreviews.com/best-wireless-access-points/#section22 ''Linksys LAPAC2600 Pro'' on '''MBReviews'''] :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8065 @1.7GHz (Dual-core) :Flash: ''Macronix'' MX30UF1G18AC-TI (128MB) :RAM: 2x ''Samsung'' K4B2G1646E (512MB DDR3) :WLAN: 2x [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9990 (2.4/5GHz)
===See also=== :[https://www.linksys.com/us/c/wireless/ Linksys Business Wireless Product] *[[Linksys LAPAC2600]] (Pro) - AC2600 Dual-Band MU-MIMO Wireless Access Point *[[Linksys LAPAC2600C]] - AC2600 Dual-Band Cloud Wave 2 Wireless Access Point *[[Linksys LAPAC1750]] (QCA) - AC1750 Business Dual-Band Wireless Access Point *[[Linksys LAPAC1750PRO]] - AC1750 Business Dual-Band Wireless Access Point *[[Linksys LAPAC1750C]] - AC1750 Dual-Band Cloud Wireless Access Point *[[Linksys LAPAC1200]] - AC1200 Business Dual-Band Wireless Access Point *[[Linksys LAPAC1200C]] - AC1200 Dual-Band Cloud Wireless Access Point *[[Linksys LAPN600]] - N600 Wireless Dual-Band 2.4/5GHz AP with PoE *[[Linksys LAPN300]] - N300 Wireless Single-Band 2.4GHz AP with PoE
